Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It only adjusted its form temporarily... There's no substantial change...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "In that case... Let's keep suppressing it!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Sooner or later, we'll find its weak point!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Time to take out your secret weapon, don't you think?", 4: '1'}
{2: "...I don't know what you're talking about, Watanabe.", 3: '14', 4: 'You noticed...', 5: '14'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...You've done so much preparation. I would be a fool if I couldn't guess it already.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That's more than just a communication relay station, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia, tell him.', 3: '31', 4: "We weren't hiding it on purpose.", 5: '30'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Of course, I understand you have your concerns.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'The railgun was fully charged long ago!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's still a work in progress here. Wait for my signal.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Who are you? You look familiar though.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We had a discussion and decided that I would be the best candidate to fire the Prism.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I see. So the people in the office have already granted the permission... Alright.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hmph, Lucia... I've never seen you like this.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The energy level of the core is rising again after the transformation!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Now I'm curious how many forms it can have.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The Prism needs more time to stabilize and aim for best accuracy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "From now on, I'll try to expose its weakness.", 4: '1'}
